name: Graveyard Smash (itch) (Austin Rogers)
description:
Directions 

Move with WASD or Arrow keys, shoot with mouse. Destroy tombstones (+1) and pumpkins (+2) to stack up bullets for your next shot (your current bullet count is displayed under you). Rack up points by killing enemies and tombstones/pumpkins.

Made by Austin Rogers, Sean Cole, and Kevin Oliver.
